data.eml:eml: Tachysurus spilotus, a new species of catfish from central Vietnam (Teleostei: Bagridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Heok Hee (2009): Tachysurus spilotus, a new species of catfish from central Vietnam (Teleostei: Bagridae). Zootaxa 2283: 16-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191222
